p1: If you've reached your State Pension age and have not received an invitation letter, you'll need to call us to claim your State Pension.
p2: You'll need your National Insurance number and we'll ask you to confirm some personal details.

Monday to Friday, 8am to 6pm UK time.
Closed UK public holidays.
